Twitter for me is used almost explicitly for expressing my views and opinions about political issues, including local, state and federal matters.

Social Media can provide excellent platforms for education, news gathering, entertainment and communication but too often censorship is interfering with free speech which will in time render these useless to the populace.

But that's a completely different issue that isn't just specific to Twitter.
